author: Simon Difford
description: There's a lot of Daiquiri going on in this very tasty vodka-based cocktail – indeed so much that we couldn't help trying the same drink with a rum base - a Pineapple Daiquiri.
name: Pineapple Martini (Difford's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
